content: **crochet make-up pad with treble crochets and relief-treble crochets in drops safran the piece is worked in the round middle out ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no e-307 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1 make-up pad measures approx 8 cm in diameter **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 59 red clay 50 g colour 56 powder pink 50 g colour 22 light brown 50 g colour 18 off white 1 make-up pad weighs approx 4 g you can make 12 pads out of 50 g **crochet gauge ** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
